title: Lockdown Nation (with Colum Eastwood MP)
itunes:title: Lockdown Nation (with Colum Eastwood MP)
description:
The UK has been late to dealing with the coronavirus outbreak, SDLP leader Colum Eastwood MP tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing. He says the restrictions people have to follow in Northern Ireland as the province deals with the crisis are causing real hardship.

Bloomberg's EMEA news director Stuart Wallace and our health reporter John Lauerman joins to discuss the possibility of a full London lockdown and the moves towards finding drugs to counter the virus.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
